name: Shaco
subtitle: the Demon Jester
description: Crafted long ago as a plaything for a lonely prince, the enchanted marionette Shaco now delights in murder and mayhem. Corrupted by dark magic and the loss of his beloved charge, the once-kind puppet finds pleasure only in the misery of the poor souls he torments. He uses toys and simple tricks to deadly effect, finding the results of his bloody “games” hilarious—and for those who hear a dark chuckle in the dead of night, the Demon Jester may have marked them as his next plaything.

abilities.name: Backstab
abilities.description: Shaco's basic attacks and Two-Shiv Poison deal additional damage when striking from behind.

abilities.name: Deceive
abilities.description:
Shaco becomes Invisible and teleports to target location.

His first attack while Invisible is empowered, dealing bonus damage and critically striking if he attacks from behind.

abilities.name: Jack In The Box
abilities.description: Shaco creates a hidden animated Jack-in-the-Box. When triggered, it will fear and attack nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Two-Shiv Poison
abilities.description: Shaco's Shivs passively poison targets on hit, slowing their Move Speed. He can throw his Shivs to deal damage and poison the target. The thrown Shiv deals bonus damage if the target is below 30% health.
